text: How can you specify which VPC endpoints or external IP addresses can access your Amazon S3 bucket?

answers.text: Set up a Site-to-Site VPN connection between the VPC or External IP and the S3 Bucket.
Use an IAM policy to specify which VPC endpoints or external IP addresses can access the S3 bucket.
Set up a Direct Connect service between the VPC endpoint (or IP address) and S3.
Use a bucket policy to specify which VPC endpoints or external IP addresses can access the S3 bucket.
